    | timestamp = 00:52:49.239
    | text      = Many of you have heard the ad that he ran.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:52:51.760
    | text      = Sam, look, I need you to be on the team here.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:52:54.519
    | text      = So many of you probably know who David Clark is.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:52:58.159
    | text      = And if not, he's the sheriff who used to show up on Fox News sometimes and wear a cowboy
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:53:02.480
    | text      = hat with fake decorative military medals he'd just given himself, looking like a real dick.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:53:07.760
    | text      = He gained a fair amount of attention when he spoke at the Republican National Convention
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:53:11.119
    | text      = in 2016 and at CPAC in 2017.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:53:14.280
    | text      = And he also started to imply pretty heavily that he was in consideration for a position
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:53:17.800
    | text      = with Trump's Department of Homeland Security.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:53:20.559
    | text      = That position never materialized, and we can all consider ourselves lucky that it did not,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:53:25.000
    | text      = because David Clark is a fucking madman and would probably be in consideration for worst
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:53:29.119
    | text      = modern sheriff if Joe Arpaio didn't exist.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:53:32.920
    | text      = Before he was the sheriff, David Clark was a Milwaukee patrol cop, joining the force
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:53:36.599
    | text      = in 1978.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:53:39.059
    | text      = As he rose through the ranks, Clark was very careful to present a manicured image to the
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:53:42.639
    | text      = media, and it paid off when he was selected to replace Lev Baldwin, who retired as sheriff
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:53:47.320
    | text      = of Milwaukee County in 2002, in the middle of his term.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:53:52.480
    | text      = From that point on, Clark ramped up his media presentation even further, expertly staging
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:53:57.159
    | text      = photo shoots, seeding stories that made the department look good into the media, and always
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:54:02.039
    | text      = being seen in a full uniform.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:54:04.400
    | text      = However, behind that facade was a very different person.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:54:07.960
    | text      = A retired detective who worked with Clark told Milwaukee Magazine, quote, the people
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:54:11.920
    | text      = who love him don't know him, and the people who know him don't like him at all.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:54:16.340
    | text      = When he was in consideration for sheriff in 2002, he suspiciously wasn't endorsed by the
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:54:20.599
    | text      = Milwaukee Police Association, even though he was the only Milwaukee police officer running,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:54:25.880
    | text      = which I think speaks volumes.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:54:27.360
    | text      = Yeah.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:54:28.360
    | text      = Yeah, when you consider how close-knit and fucking intense police unions are.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:54:33.960
    | text      = They do seem to support each other.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:54:35.519
    | text      = Yeah, a little bit.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:54:36.519
    | text      = So when you got a cop running for sheriff and they're like, nah.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:54:40.380
    | text      = Fuck that guy.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:54:41.659
    | text      = That's not good.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:54:42.659
    | text      = Yeah.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:54:43.659
    | text      = There have been warning signs that Clark might be a really bad dude.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:54:47.199
    | text      = In 1994, Clark was accused of using excessive force against a 15-year-old boy.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:54:52.079
    | text      = The child's mother filed a complaint after Clark, who was off duty, allegedly chased
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:54:56.400
    | text      = her son and his friends down, drew his gun on them, and made them lie on the ground.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:55:00.980
    | text      = The boy was one of five kids Clark saw throwing rocks at cars.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:55:04.639
    | text      = Accounts vary, with the mother saying Clark kicked her son in the head and sighed, causing
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:55:08.320
    | text      = bruised ribs, and Clark claiming he just, quote, used his foot to turn over one boy,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:55:13.679
    | text      = which to my ears kind of sounds like a cop politely describing kicking someone.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:55:16.940
    | text      = You got it.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:55:17.940
    | text      = Whatever the case is, the complaint was dismissed, and the police commission ruled there was
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:55:21.739
    | text      = insufficient evidence in the case.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:55:24.219
    | text      = Clark's later career implies to me that this mother's complaint might have been valid.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:55:28.639
    | text      = Traditionally, it's been the role of the sheriff's department to, quote, patrol the highways,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:55:32.800
    | text      = oversee the jails, and provide security in courts.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:55:35.599
    | text      = Beyond that, they're, you know, county-based duties, but the city policing was left to
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:55:39.320
    | text      = local police departments, even though the city is technically within the county.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:55:45.079
    | text      = One of Sheriff Clark's big things was expanding the role of the sheriff's department to involve
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:55:48.920
    | text      = itself in city matters.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:55:50.880
    | text      = As Milwaukee County Supervisor Gary Broderick put it, quote, he's imposed himself on some
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:55:56.019
    | text      = other law enforcement agencies, and it's uninvited.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:55:59.659
    | text      = It would be one thing if he was doing a great job with the normal responsibilities of the
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:56:03.500
    | text      = sheriff's office and he just wanted to share his excellence with these other struggling
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:56:07.239
    | text      = departments, but that was definitely not the case.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:56:10.880
    | text      = According to Milwaukee Magazine, in the first few months of Clark's first term, quote, one
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:56:15.440
    | text      = of his deputies got into a scuffle at the airport with Police Chief Jones.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:56:19.280
    | text      = A convicted murderer wrestled a gun from a deputy in a downtown courtroom, then wounded
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:56:23.559
    | text      = the deputy before being shot dead by a police officer.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:56:26.960
    | text      = And at Waupun State Prison, two Milwaukee prisoners escaped from a van driven by two
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:56:31.480
    | text      = of Clark's deputies.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:56:33.400
    | text      = And sure, you could make the argument that it was just stuff that happened at the beginning
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:56:36.960
    | text      = of his term.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:56:37.960
    | text      = It's probably all just stuff that was lingering from Lev Baldwin's previous term, and Clark
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:56:41.900
    | text      = just hadn't had enough time to sort things out.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:56:44.619
    | text      = And you'd be wrong, because things got way, way worse as Clark's term in office continued.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:56:50.219
    | text      = On September 13, 2010, an epileptic man had a seizure while restrained in sheriff's custody.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:56:55.960
    | text      = Officers didn't seem to care or were so completely clueless that their actions made things worse.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:57:00.800
    | text      = Thirty-one-year-old James Perry died, and no one was held responsible.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:57:05.199
    | text      = On April 24, 2016, Terrell Thomas died while in custody in the Milwaukee County Jail.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:57:11.159
    | text      = The medical examiner's office will go on to declare the case a homicide, and when you
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:57:14.880
    | text      = get into the details, it's pretty easy to see why.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:57:18.079
    | text      = Thomas died of dehydration nine days after being arrested and brought to the jail.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:57:23.159
    | text      = Thomas had been arrested on suspicion of shooting a man, but hadn't been charged with anything
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:57:27.119
    | text      = yet.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:57:28.119
    | text      = He was also bipolar, so his behavior in the jail had been deemed fitting to place him
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:57:32.400
    | text      = in solitary confinement, which on its own would be enough for me to say, fuck David
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:57:36.360
    | text      = Clark.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:57:37.579
    | text      = The guards would claim that they did what they did because Thomas had previously tried
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:57:41.280
    | text      = to flood his cell, but I don't believe that as an explanation for why they shut off the
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:57:45.519
    | text      = water to his cell.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:57:47.599
    | text      = Fellow inmates told the Journal Sentinel newspaper that they could hear Thomas begging for water
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:57:52.159
    | text      = for days before he died, and given the fact that he died of dehydration, I think it's
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:57:56.679
    | text      = a pretty good bet that they didn't give him any.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:57:59.480
    | text      = This treatment of a person is completely horrifying, regardless of what they may or may not have
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:58:03.679
    | text      = done to end up in custody.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:58:05.719
    | text      = The idea of being incarcerated somewhere, put in solitary confinement, then dehydrated
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:58:09.719
    | text      = to death over the span of days is a terror that no one should have to live through.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:58:14.639
    | text      = In the end, three jail employees were charged for Thomas' death, and Milwaukee County paid
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:58:18.739
    | text      = out $6.75 million in a settlement, but David Clark was never held responsible in any way,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:58:24.840
    | text      = such as a travesty.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:58:26.719
    | text      = In July 2016, Sade Swazer was incarcerated and pregnant.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:58:30.920
    | text      = Her newborn child died in that county jail.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:58:33.659
    | text      = In December 2015, Jennifer Jossen's newborn child suffered a similar fate after guards
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:58:38.159
    | text      = failed to provide appropriate health care.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:58:40.760
    | text      = That same year, Kristin Fybrink died of alcohol and heroin withdrawal in the county jail in
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:58:45.880
    | text      = Milwaukee.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:58:46.880
    | text      = There is a serious pattern of negligence and outright brutality that was allowed to exist
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:58:50.760
    | text      = under Sheriff Clark's watch, and it's all sickening shit.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:58:54.900
    | text      = In 2017, Milwaukee County paid a $6.7 million settlement to a woman who alleged she was
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:59:03.079
    | text      = raped by a guard in David Clark's prison multiple times while she was incarcerated there.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:59:07.880
    | text      = At the time of her incarceration and assault, she was 19 years old and pregnant.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:59:11.960
    | text      = She eventually gave birth in prison and unsuccessfully sued the county for the fact that she was
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:59:15.880
    | text      = made to give birth while shackled.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:59:18.320
    | text      = This wasn't the only person who suffered this kind of treatment.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:59:21.039
    | text      = It's estimated that at least 40 women who have given birth in David Clark's jail have
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:59:24.780
    | text      = had to do so while handcuffed through labor.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:59:27.800
    | text      = Sheriff David Clark is an absolute monster, and if he had a shred of humanity on him,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:59:31.360
    | text      = he would have resigned long before any of these people had to suffer what they did.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:59:35.960
    | text      = But he didn't.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:59:36.960
    | text      = Instead, he defended the practice of handcuffing women in labor, and doesn't seem to think
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:59:40.840
    | text      = that he's had anything to do with the completely out of line and disgusting organization that
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:59:45.320
    | text      = he was in charge of.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:59:47.280
    | text      = You may notice that a lot of these problems seem to have gotten worse towards the end
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:59:50.659
    | text      = of his time as sheriff.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:59:52.280
    | text      = And probably that's because by then, he was kind of phoning it in, in favor of becoming
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:59:56.519
    | text      = a national media figure.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:59:58.039
    | text      = In 2015, he launched a podcast called The People's Sheriff on Glenn Beck's Blaze Network.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:00:03.719
    | text      = Weirdly, that same year, Sheriff Clark went on a six-day trip to Russia as part of the
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:00:08.159
    | text      = NRA delegation.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:00:09.159
    | text      = He was paid at least $6,000 to go on that trip from the group Right to Bear Arms, which
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:00:13.920
    | text      = was the group run by Maria Butina, who pled guilty in December 2018 to felony charges
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:00:18.900
    | text      = of conspiracy to act as an unregistered foreign agent of the Russian state, and was sentenced
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:00:23.760
    | text      = to 18 months in prison.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:00:26.840
    | text      = I have legitimately no idea what he was doing there, or what any of that means, but it doesn't
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:00:30.679
    | text      = seem cool.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:00:32.719
    | text      = Clark was sheriff of Milwaukee County from 2002 to 2017.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:00:37.760
    | text      = One of the likely reasons he was able to stay in office so long was he was registered as
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:00:41.500
    | text      = a Democrat, even though he was very obviously a far-right conservative.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:00:45.719
    | text      = In 2003, he cheered on the Iraq war, going so far as to speak at a support our troops
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:00:50.760
    | text      = rally with Scott Walker and Paul Ryan, where he expressed his awe for George W. Bush's
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:00:55.639
    | text      = quote, will and courage.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:00:58.400
    | text      = Milwaukee is an insanely Democrat-leaning area.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:01:01.639
    | text      = The county has only swung Republican in three presidential elections since 1912, and two
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:01:07.619
    | text      = of those three times were Dwight Eisenhower.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:01:11.199
    | text      = Being as a Democrat and being the complete opposite is a really smart move there, particularly
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:01:16.159
    | text      = once you're already in office.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:01:18.159
    | text      = You generally win any primary based on incumbency bias and name recognition, then in the general
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:01:23.360
    | text      = election, it's you versus a Republican.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:01:25.860
    | text      = This is exactly what you see in every election cycle for David Clark, relatively narrow wins
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:01:30.920
    | text      = in the primary and crushing landslides in the general election.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:01:34.639
    | text      = I'm not saying that this is what he did, but if you were a manipulative, power-hungry piece
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:01:38.780
    | text      = of shit, your plans might look exactly like what David Clark did.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:01:42.880
    | text      = When he stepped down as sheriff, Clark immediately took a position as a senior advisor for the
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:01:47.519
    | text      = Trump-backing super PAC, America First Action.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:01:51.599
    | text      = In 2017 to 2018 alone, right-wing billionaire Sheldon Adelson and his wife gave $10 million
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:01:57.800
    | text      = to that super PAC.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:01:59.400
    | text      = They also received a lot of donations from America First Policies, the political action
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:02:03.280
    | text      = committee we talked about a while back that is run by a former Trump campaign official
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:02:08.320
    | text      = and appears to be infested with Nazis.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:02:10.960
    | text      = They received a lot of donations from that group, probably because they are affiliated.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:02:15.400
    | text      = America First Action is the super PAC, America First Policies is the non-profit organization,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:02:19.639
    | text      = but they're basically the same group.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:02:22.039
    | text      = This is a little bit of a non-sequitur, but also I know that David Clark is involved with
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:02:26.460
